title: 94: The Praise of Folly
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Desiderius Erasmus is a great name, and he wrote a satire in which the goddess Folly gives an extemporaneous speech in praise of herself. It's great. Let's get silly.
itunes:author: Folly, Silliness, and the Goof
itunes:subtitle: If nobody will praise you, do it yourself
itunes:summary: Desiderius Erasmus is a great name, and he wrote a satire in which the goddess Folly gives an extemporaneous speech in praise of herself. It's great. Let's get silly.
itunes:title: 94: The Praise of Folly
